00058         TCPlistener(ServerSocket listener, I2PSocketManager S, NamedDB info, NamedDB database, Log _log, AtomicBoolean lives) {
00059                 this.database = database;
00060                 this.info = info;
00061                 this._log = _log;
00062                 this.socketManager = S;
00063                 this.listener = listener;
00064                 this.lives = lives;
00065         }

00071         public void run() {
00072                 boolean g = false;
00073                 int conn = 0;
00074                 Socket server = null;
00075                 try {
00076                         try {
00077                                 listener.setSoTimeout(50); // We don't block, we cycle and check.
00078                                 while (lives.get()) {
00079                                         try {
00080                                                 server = listener.accept();
00081                                                 g = true;
00082                                         } catch (SocketTimeoutException ste) {
00083                                                 g = false;
00084                                         }
00085                                         if (g) {
00086                                                 conn++;
00087                                                 // toss the connection to a new thread.
00088                                                 TCPtoI2P conn_c = new TCPtoI2P(socketManager, server, info, database, lives);
00089                                                 Thread t = new Thread(conn_c, Thread.currentThread().getName() + " TCPtoI2P " + conn);
00090                                                 t.start();
00091                                                 g = false;
00092                                         }
00093                                 }
00094                         } catch (IOException ioe) {
00095                         }
00096                 } finally {
00097                         try {
00098                                 listener.close();
00099                         } catch (IOException ex) {
00100                         }
00101                 //System.out.println("TCPlistener: " + Thread.currentThread().getName() +  "Done.");
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 }
